description: Weighing only 590 grams, and with its high-quality materials and thoughtful features, the beast is a lightweight all-rounder and a must for any ski tour!<br><br>lightweight, compact and efficient: weighing only 580 grams, our new beast is a lightweight, cleverly designed avalanche shovel that is perfect for beginners as well as for more demanding users. Thanks to its 83-centimeter working length and 2.3l scoop volume, the beast is the ideal size for efficient work after an avalanche.<br>the combination of high-quality materials, high sidewalls and a pronounced center ridge ensure the necessary tensile strength and stability. A sharp, sturdy cutting edge guarantees optimum performance. Thanks to the pack-friendly shovel blade with its non-slip step grooves and the telescopic, rapid-closure shaft, the beast avalanche shovel is easily stowed away in any ortovox ski touring backpack in next to no time. With other features such as the t-grip with switchover function for left and right-handers, the beast focuses on the essentials and is a must for any touring backpack.
name: Shovel Beast PC
